title: Interpretation of a chicken cage in a dream. The meaning of chicken in a dream

preview.html: She dreams of a chicken cage for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried man, whether he is putting chicks in the cage or in the chicken coop, eating slaughtered grilled chicken. By Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi and others. Chicken in a dream is one of the dreams that convey to us a large number of different meanings, as chicken is a type of bird that is characterized by extreme greed and taste and is a domestic bird that does not cause any kind of harm to it. Anyone, when one of us sees in his dream a vision searching through Internet sites differs from the true meaning and accurate interpretation of these two visions today, and through this exhibition we present to you the greatest Arab commentators and scholars, including the translator Ibn. Shaheen in his interpretations. A chicken cage in a dream. A chicken: an ignorant, ignorant woman, a beauty, the descendant of a free owner, or the children of a slave, a concubine, or a maid. And whoever eats its meat, money will be taken from non-Arabs, and whoever sees chickens and a peacock in his house, he is the owner of calamities. And immorality, and it was said: Chicken and feathers are beneficial wealth. Chicken cage: means a house, so if he sees that he has bought a cage and confined a chicken in it, then he will buy a house and move his wife into it. If a cage is placed on his head and he walks around in the market, then it is his home and witnesses will bear witness to it. Interpretation of a chicken in a man’s dream: If a person sees many chickens in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will reach a high position, and God knows best. A large number of chickens in his house, and this is evidence that the dreamer will marry a very beautiful girl, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a chicken in one dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is cooking chicken, this is evidence of engagement or marriage to a wealthy man and she will live with him in happiness and joy. This indicates the end of an argument or problem with a person you love, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a chicken in a married man’s dream: If a married woman dreams that she is cooking food, this is evidence that her husband loves her very much and that there is affection, love, and respect between them. By God, if a married woman dreams that there are a lot of chickens in the house, this is evidence of a lot of goodness in this woman’s life. Interpretation of a chicken in a pregnant woman’s dream: If a pregnant woman sees a raw and uncooked chicken in a dream, this indicates problems during pregnancy and during childbirth, and that these The woman will give birth to a male child. Of the great beauty that fascinates everyone, if a pregnant woman dreams that she is cooking a lot of chicken, then this is evidence that she has satisfied a desire that she had a long time ago, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a chicken in a divorced woman’s dream. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is slaughtering chicken, this is evidence that The problems will end and you will soon hear good news, God willing. It is evidence of the love of everyone around her, if the divorced woman dreams that the roof of her house has many chickens running around. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretations of a dream about chicken - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a silver ring on Ibn Sirin’s left hand

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about wearing a silver ring on the left hand. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a silver ring on the left hand. Does the interpretation of the dream differ in terms of its meaning according to the gender of the dreamer? What did the great jurists say in interpreting the symbol of silver? Is wearing a silver ring on the right hand different from the left? All these details you will learn to interpret in the following article. You have a dream that confuses you and you are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a silver ring on the left hand. Commentators agreed that a silver ring in a dream indicates faith in God, and if the appearance of the ring is beautiful, it indicates good deeds. There are many things that the dreamer does throughout his life until he obtains God’s satisfaction. If the dreamer works in the silver jewelry trade and sees that he is wearing a different and beautiful silver ring, he will earn a lot of money, his business will expand and his profits will increase soon. When the dreamer sees his father giving him a beautiful silver ring, with Cloves of precious stones, these are valuable advice that the father gives to the fortune teller in his life, and if the dreamer wears the ring on his hand and finds it attractive, then it is. The dream impressed him very much, and it indicated that the advice he would get from his father about it would help him in an important matter in his life. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a silver ring on Ibn Sirin’s left hand: The scene shows a great position that the dreamer will gain, but if he dreams that he is wearing a silver ring that is rusty and contaminated With a little dirt, the vision indicates losses and many problems. Whoever wears a shiny and expensive silver ring in his dream, this is a sign of dominance and high status. Purity is one of the most prominent concepts of this scene. If a woman sees that she is wearing a large, beautiful silver ring, this is a sign that she is an honorable lady and maintains her biography and reputation among people. The same interpretation was given by the interpreters of the man who wears a silver ring in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of wearing a silver ring on the left hand of an unmarried woman. A group of jurists said that if the dreamer wears a silver ring on her left hand, it indicates her marriage to a righteous man. As for the other group of jurists, he said: If an unmarried woman wears a silver ring in her dream while she is engaged in reality, her joy with her engagement will not be complete and she will break up with her fiancé. Or a job. If she was wearing a silver ring on her left hand and then it broke and fell to the ground, the dream may indicate a marriage related to her and after a while she will be separated from her husband. If he sees that the ring is made of silver and has parts of copper in it, then the scene does not deserve praise for its interpretation It indicates despair, misery and anguish that he will fall into. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a silver ring on the left hand of a married woman: If the dreamer sees that her gold wedding ring that she was wearing on her left hand has turned into a silver ring, then this is a divorce that he will suffer from in the near future. But if the dreamer finds in Her dream is that one of her adult sons is wearing a silver ring on his left hand, then she will get married soon. If the dreamer is waiting for something in reality and wants to hear news

But if the dreamer finds in Her dream is that one of her adult sons is wearing a silver ring on his left hand, then she will get married soon. title: Interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream

preview.html: Fundraising is an essential component of many people's lives. Thus, the encyclopedia provides an interpretation of paper money in a dream. Most people seek to grow their money. To have a more luxurious and stable life; The Holy Qur’an mentioned people’s love for money, and God Almighty said: (And you love money with great love), meaning that you love money very much. Seeing money in a dream has a great impact on a person’s life, and a person is very happy when he sees money in a dream. So let's get to know the interpretation of a dream about paper money. Interpretation of a dream about banknotes in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing coins in a dream according to the number and color of these coins. This is evidence that this person is committed to implementing the provisions of Islam and the duties imposed on him by God Almighty, and he is also committed to staying away from the prohibitions that God Almighty has forbidden, and it also indicates that this person is committed to them. The doctrine of Abu Hanifa Al-Numan. But if one sees paper money in a dream. Is this evidence of this person’s negligence in fulfilling the rights of God Almighty, and that fulfilling the duties imposed on him by God is incomplete, and is this evidence of the necessity of returning to God Almighty and sincere repentance to God? Lest that person fall into unpleasant consequences in this world and the hereafter. But if someone sees only a bank note, this is evidence that God will grant that person a good child who will help him with the necessities of life, but if that person sees that he has lost a paper money. This is evidence that this person has lost his son or is unable to perform some religious duties, such as his inability to perform the rituals of Hajj or Umrah. This is due to his financial or physical weakness. But if one sees in a dream a treasure chest full of banknotes. Is this evidence that this person will be blessed by God Almighty with exciting money and abundant provision, whether through his work or through the inheritance left for him by one of his relatives, and if he sees five notes in his dream? This is evidence that this person continues to perform the five daily prayers on time, but if he loses this money, he will do likewise. This is evidence of this person’s delay in performing the five daily prayers on time, and this is good news for him to respect what God Almighty has commanded, and avoid what God has forbidden. Interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream for a single woman: And if a single woman sees banknotes in her dream; This is evidence that this woman is ambitious and works hard to achieve many successes. This is evidence that Almighty God will marry this woman to a wealthy man. This is evidence that this woman will face many problems and difficulties in her life. Interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is getting money in a dream. This is evidence that God gives this woman good company that will help her in life, but if she loses this money in a dream. This is proof that this woman will lose this company even if she finds her face on these coins. This is evidence that God will give her a lot of money that will enable her to live happily with her family

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a dead person

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person in a dream: It is one of the most common dreams among people. It causes anxiety, confusion, and fear even in the dead and makes the dreamer think a lot about what the vision will lead to or what it may express. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person: Seeing a dead person smiling in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will be able to overcome On the crises that he faces in reality. Dreaming of a dead person indicates the achievement of hopes and goals and getting rid of everything that negatively affects the dreamer. Seeing a dead person in a dream symbolizes his need in reality for alms and prayers so that he can be in a better situation. If the dreamer sees a dead person in a dream Saying hello to him means that in reality he will get a lot of money that will allow him to reach a good position. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a dead person Seeing a dead person Ibn Sirin in a dream means that happiness and confidence will come to the people of this house and the dreamer will be exposed to some positive events. Dreaming about a dead person Laughing in a dream indicates that the dead person will enjoy the afterlife due to his righteousness in this world. Seeing a dead person in a dream is evidence that someone from that family will bid farewell to celibacy and begin a happy married life after a short period of time. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person for one person: Seeing a dead person in her dream is about a dead person. It is evidence that she will soon marry a good man who will provide her with support and help and will be the best partner and husband for her. To dream of a dead person in a Virgo girl’s dream is a sign that she will enjoy a wide and abundant livelihood during the coming period and that she will be in a state of happiness and comfort. If she sees an unmarried woman A dead man married in her dream, this means that news will reach her during the coming period, which will be a reason for her happiness and confidence. A dead man in a virgin girl’s dream while laughing indicates that he will soon achieve the things that he has always dreamed of and strived to achieve. Interpretation of a dream of a dead man for a married woman: Seeing the corpse of a woman Married in a dream is a sign of her transition to wealth and the acquisition of great wealth after a short period of time. Dreaming of a dead woman is evidence that during the coming period the dreamer will be exposed to abundant good things that will allow her to live in peace and comfort. A dead woman in a married woman’s dream means that she will be able to provide A quiet and stable life for her husband and she will not be exposed to anything that could cause her distress. If a married woman sees a dead body in her dream, this means that she will get rid of the problems and crises that she is suffering from and her next life will be more stable. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a pregnant woman: Seeing a dead pregnant woman tells her something, this indicates However, she maintains her health and that of her fetus and takes care to fortify it with prayers and memories. Seeing a dead person in a dream gives her something, as this indicates that the time of birth is approaching, and she will see her child soon. If a pregnant woman sees a dead person smiling in her dream, this means that there is a high probability that she will give birth soon. A healthy male who will be free of any disease. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased woman about a pregnant woman in a dream: It can be interpreted that in reality she is suffering from distress due to the lack of support and pressures she faces. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman in a dream: seeing a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country: Although it is really interesting, the dreamer may be surprised to see it and then want to know the interpretations and messages that this particular dream carries, so today we will show you and examine with you a wide range of acceptable interpretations regarding this dream.Interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign countryTravel In a dream to a foreign country is evidence that the dreamer is ambitious, trying all the time to achieve what he wants and dreams of. Seeing traveling in a dream in a foreign country if the dreamer feels sad, is evidence of his desire in reality to travel with obstacles. Preparing to travel to a foreign country in a dream is evidence However, God Almighty will provide the dreamer with a lot of money through a legitimate path in the shortest time, and God knows best. Traveling to a foreign country in a dream to work is evidence of the dreamer’s success in a specific project, and God knows best. Traveling in a dream to a foreign country to study is evidence of the dreamer’s superiority and achievement. Ibn Sirin said that traveling to a foreign country in a dream is evidence that the dreamer’s circumstances will change, whether negatively or positively. Traveling in a dream to a foreign country is evidence that the dreamer will achieve his goals and desires. Desired. If the dreamer travels to a foreign country and is satisfied, then the dream indicates blessings, kindness, and close marriage for the single person, comfort, and the end of worries and sadness in general for the dreamer. Interpretation of dreams about traveling to a foreign country for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman traveling to a foreign country in a dream is evidence of her imminent marriage, and God I know. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is going to a far away country, it is evidence that there is a young man from her family who wants to propose to her, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is traveling to a foreign country, but by train, then the dream indicates a positive change that will affect her life and it will improve. Her circumstances, and God knows best. Seeing the same unmarried woman in a dream traveling to a foreign country with a red bag is evidence of her close marriage, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream traveling to a foreign country carrying a white bag is evidence of her engagement soon, but if the color of the bag is black This indicates her failure in the relationship she enters into, and God is Most High and knows best. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream traveling to a foreign country is evidence of sustenance and many good things on her way to her, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she is packing a travel bag This indicates a blessing that will come in her life, and God knows best. To see in a dream a married woman who has long awaited pregnancy, and that she is traveling to a foreign country, and with her a white suitcase, is evidence that pregnancy is imminent, and God knows best. A married woman who travels in a dream to a foreign country with Her husband carrying a black bag is evidence of problems in marital life that may lead to separation, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream that she is traveling to a foreign country and bringing her bag with her child is a sign of

title: Interpretation of a snail in a dream: Seeing a dream about eating a snail

title: Learn about the interpretation of the menstrual cycle in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Menstruation in a dream, this vision is considered one of the common visions in the world of dreams, and it has been talked about a lot to the point of disagreement among some jurists, and this disagreement is due to the difference in the details of the vision from one person to another, as well as a special case of the dreamer, and there are certain cases that negatively or positively affect the context of the dream, and in this article we look at all the indications and cases specific to the dream of menstruation in more detail and explanation. What is the interpretation of the dream of menstruation in a dream? Seeing menstruation expresses the conditions of life and its fluctuations from time to time, and whoever sees that he is menstruating at the age of menopause, this indicates good news and the pregnancy of a blessed son. And the menstrual cycle, if it comes out, is money that the dreamer has harvested, or sins and sins out of ignorance, and may follow bad habits that affect her life. Menstrual blood indicates collecting money in an illegal way, and drinking menstrual blood symbolizes magic and severe envy, and if the color of the blood is black, this is a sign of pleasure and bad morals and ethics. Menstruation in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing menstruation indicates sins, transgressions and bad habits that a person continues with, especially if menstruation is not on time, and washing After menstruation, it indicates purity, cleanliness, and repentance from sin. Whoever sees menstrual blood, this indicates seclusion or the husband’s departure from his wife, and menstrual blood expresses the discussion and concerns of the soul and the fears that inhabit her heart and weaken her steadfastness, and if the man is menstruating, this indicates lying and lies. Seeing the menstrual cycle is a sign of deficiency in worship and lack of religiosity, and in other aspects, menstruation is a sign of achieving goals and goals, getting out of hardships, achieving planned goals, and changing circumstances for the better. Menstruation in a dream for a single woman This vision symbolizes distancing from natural nature and committing sins and transgressions, and this vision can be a hidden message about the date of menstruation and preparing to pass this stage in peace, and menstruation indicates marriage in the near future, if the vision is at the time of menstruation. If you see a woman menstruating, this indicates the presence of a woman who spreads negative thoughts and misleads her from the truth, and can cause doubt and panic in her heart. If she sees menstrual blood on her clothes, this indicates evil, malice, and breach in some of her, and as for washing with blood Menstruation means abandoning misguidance, returning from sins, repenting from sins and disobedience, and renewing hope after despair. Dreaming of menstruation at its inappropriate time for a single woman If the fortune teller sees her menstrual cycle at a different time, this indicates the difficulties and hardships she faces, the problems and crises that followed, and the fears she faces about the future. This vision also expresses insistence on harmful behavior, committing a sin that requires repentance, and wrong behavior, and the vision can be evidence of getting out of the experience or recovering from illness and restoring the spirit and health. From a psychological point of view, this vision is a reflection of the need to prepare for the approaching date of the menstrual cycle, as the vision may come from the subconscious and the messages it sends

Menstruation in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees menstrual blood, this indicates i'tikaf or the husband leaving his wife. Menstrual blood expresses the debates and concerns of the soul and the fears that reside in her heart and weaken her stability. If a man menstruates, this indicates lies and lies. About the timing of menstruation and preparing to pass this stage safely. Menstruation indicates marriage in the near future, if the vision is at the time of menstruation. A single woman dreams of menstruation at an inappropriate time. If the fortune teller sees her menstrual cycle at a different time, then this It indicates the difficulties and difficulties that you face, the problems and crises that follow, and the fears that you face from the future. The vision can be evidence of emerging from the experience or recovering from the disease. And restore the spirit and health. From a psychological point of view, this vision is a reflection of the need to prepare for the approaching menstrual period, as the vision may come from the subconscious and the messages it sees
